
# The Avengers Initiative
![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-PD/CC0-blue)

## Description
* Assemble Earth's mightiest hereos to fight the battles we (regular humans) cannot fight.

## Install & Run with
* node Avengers.Assemble

## Built with
* bootstrap ,other
